pages.text: The $(mob)Baphomet$() is a monster that spawns in the $(thing)Nether$(). It is immune to Fire and Wither. It attacks players on sight with a mix of hurling fireballs at ranged and melee strikes which apply $(thing)Weakness$() and $(thing)Slowness$() effects.
$(mob)Baphomet$() drops $(item)Nether Wart Jam$() on death. These are a moderate source of food and provide a 40% $(thing)Speed$() and $(thing)Haste$() effect for 30 seconds.
$(mob)Baphomet$() drops $(item)Nether Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random block found in the $(thing)Nether$().
